problem:
Given that
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix} = -7,\]find
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix}.\]
solution:
We are told that
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix} = -7.\]If we multiply the second row by 2, then we get
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d & 2e & 2f \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix} = -14.\]Adding five times the third row to the second row does not change the value of the determinant:
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix} = -14.\]Then multiplying the third row by $-1$ gives us
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = \boxed{14}.\]
model_solution:
Step 1:  We need to find the determinant of the given 3x3 matrix.
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix}\]

To find the determinant, we will expand along the first row.
Step 2: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = a \begin{vmatrix} 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -h & -i \end{vmatrix} - b \begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -i \end{vmatrix} + c \begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h \\ -g & -h \end{vmatrix}\]
Step 3:
\[\begin{vmatrix} 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -i(2e + 5h) - (-h)(2f + 5i) = -2ei - 5hi + 2fh + 5hi = -2ei + 2fh,\]
\[\begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -i \end{vmatrix} = -i(2d + 5g) - (-g)(2f + 5i) = -2di - 5gi + 2fg + 5gi = -2di + 2fg,\]
\[\begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h \\ -g & -h \end{vmatrix} = -h(2d + 5g) - (-g)(2e + 5h) = -2hd - 5hg + 2eg + 5hg = -2hd + 2eg\]
Step 4: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = a(-2ei + 2fh) - b(-2di + 2fg) + c(-2hd + 2eg)\]
Step 5:
\[= a(-2ei + 2fh) + b(2di - 2fg) + c(2hd - 2eg)\]
Step 6: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2aei + 2afh + 2bdi - 2bfg + 2chd - 2ceg\]
Step 7: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2aei + 2afh + 2bdi - 2bfg + 2chd - 2ceg = -2(ai + bh + cg)\]
Step 8: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2(ai + bh + cg)\]
Step 9: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix}\]
Step 10:
\[= -2(-7)\]
steps:
Step 1:  We need to find the determinant of the given 3x3 matrix.
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix}\]

To find the determinant, we will expand along the first row.

Step 2: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = a \begin{vmatrix} 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -h & -i \end{vmatrix} - b \begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -i \end{vmatrix} + c \begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h \\ -g & -h \end{vmatrix}\]

Step 4: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = a(-2ei + 2fh) - b(-2di + 2fg) + c(-2hd + 2eg)\]

Step 7: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2aei + 2afh + 2bdi - 2bfg + 2chd - 2ceg = -2(ai + bh + cg)\]

Step 8: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2(ai + bh + cg)\]

Step 9: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix}\]
full_steps:
Step 1:  We need to find the determinant of the given 3x3 matrix.
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix}\]

To find the determinant, we will expand along the first row.

Step 2: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = a \begin{vmatrix} 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -h & -i \end{vmatrix} - b \begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -i \end{vmatrix} + c \begin{vmatrix} 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h \\ -g & -h \end{vmatrix}\]

Step 4: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = a(-2ei + 2fh) - b(-2di + 2fg) + c(-2hd + 2eg)\]

Step 7: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2aei + 2afh + 2bdi - 2bfg + 2chd - 2ceg = -2(ai + bh + cg)\]

Step 8: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2(ai + bh + cg)\]

Step 9: 
\[\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ 2d + 5g & 2e + 5h & 2f + 5i \\ -g & -h & -i \end{vmatrix} = -2\begin{vmatrix} a & b & c \\ d & e & f \\ g & h & i \end{vmatrix}\]
